Key Match Events: David Fry hit a two-run home run in the seventh inning, giving the lead back to the Guardians.
David Fry added an RBI on a squeeze play two innings later.
Guardians closer Emmanuel Clase completed a five-out save, giving up a run in the ninth but closing the door on Matt Vierling and the Tigers.
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers automatically earn the edge for Game 5 because Tarik Skubal is on full rest and ready to go.
Tarik Skubal shut down the Guardians over seven innings in Game 2 and hasn't given up a run in the postseason yet.
Matthew Boyd is the likely starter for the Guardians in Game 5.
